channel.title: What are YOU going to do in the summer?
channel.description:
Next week on 8.6 I will be going to Sweden on a cruise and from there on I will fly to Iraq. I think we're gonna stay there for like 30-40 days which isn't that bad but I'm not overly exited. It's really hot there and stuff, around 30-50C every day. Nights are "cooler", but still around 30C.
Ok people, tell me about your plans for the summer ;)
EDIT: HEEEEEE I AM BACK!
Wasn't quite as bad as I expected it to be. The weather sucks ass because it's basically hot 24/7 and people are inside until like 6pm before they go out. I got to see relatives that I hadn't seen for years/ever. I made new friends, bought new clothes, talked with people. However, I don't intend on going back there, ever. I'll post up a couple pics in a min =)
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/3178gg7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/11tv4hz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/qnuxiv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/13z0a5x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/x3b8f4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/i4mo9w.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/34j278g.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/3509qut.jpg[/img]

item.title: What are YOU going to do in the summer?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

I have been on the computer lately due to shit weather.

But I have also been with my best friend and fished from his boat and stuff also been swimming some, I’m looking forward to nice weather again.

Also, I’m going to this camping thing the 5th of August.

That’s 2 of the codfishes we caught one day.

Yum :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Mr.Chris:

Going off to Hungary in 2 weeks, which should be interesting. Followed by a short trip to Scotland, and then another week in Sweden. Gunna be a good summer. + lots of parties and mash ups

What city are you going to? Are you visiting anyone?

item.title: What are YOU going to do in the summer?
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:58, topic:281847”][quote author=llib link=topic=372452.msg2818634#msg2818634 date=1244431882]

I’m either going to Cedar Point or Kings Island in Ohio.

Cedar Point <3
Just went there Friday after exams, one of the best parks ever.

You pplz live by meh!?!? But yeah i love that park. I waited 4 and a half hours to ride the dragster on the day it came out.

Nope, I live in Michigan, went on a school trip.

Yay Michigan!
Points to hand
I live in Michigan also.
[/quote]
Cool, what part? I’m in the Franklin area.[/quote]

I live in Indiana! About 20 seconds from Sturgis Michigan

Read full topic
